DOC.brief_summary: Primary Objectives : - To determine excretion balance systemic exposure radioactivity intravenous infusion [ 14C ] -AVE8062 humans - To determine pharmacokinetics AVE8062 RPR258063 contribution overall exposure - To collect sample determine metabolic pathway AVE8062 identify chemical structure main metabolite Secondary Objective : - To assess safety profile drug
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Disposition Radio-labeled AVE8062 Compound Administered 30-minute IV Infusion Patients With Advanced Solid Tumor
DOC.detailed_description: The duration study patient include approximately 4 week screen phase prior first infusion study drug , 21-day study treatment cycle end treatment visit . The patient continue treatment disease progression , unacceptable toxicity , patient 's refusal treatment .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Patients advance neoplastic disease become refractory conventional treatment standard therapy exist . Age = > 18 year Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 2 Adequate hematological , hepatic renal function Exclusion criterion : Poor metabolizers CYP2C19 , CYP2C9 , CYP2D6 polymorphic UGTs exclude study The information intend contain consideration relevant patient 's potential participation clinical trial .
